Package game.dinosaurs

Class Dinosaur

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.dinosaurs.Dinosaur
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Capable, Printable, ActorInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Allosaur, Brachiosaur, Pterodactyl, Stegosaur
    public abstract class Dinosaur
extends Actor
    This is an abstract class for a Dinosaur. Since all different dinosaur will have same attributes but with different values, this abstract class is used to implements those related attributes and methods. Subclasses(eg: a specific Dinosaur type, Stegosaur) will provide implementations for the methods and attribute in this class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dinosaur

        public Dinosaur​(java.lang.String name,
                char displayChar,
                int hitPoints)
        Constructor. Each dinosaur initially would have 0 unconscious count, wander behaviour, search for nearest food and lake behaviour, and a random gender (M/F).
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Dinosaur
        displayChar - the character that will represent the Dinosaur in the display
        hitPoints - the Dinosaur's starting hit points

    • Method Detail

      • eachTurnUpdates

        public void eachTurnUpdates​(int babyCount)
        This is a method similar to tick() in other classes. It handles all necessary updates of the dinosaur and perform checks on the dinosaur on each turn(will be called in each dinosaur's playTurn). Since number of turns needed to turn into an adult is dependent on each dinosaur, it will be the input parameter here. Updates will be done: - Increase unconsciousCount by 1 if remain unconscious - Deduct hit points by 1 if is still conscious - Deduct water level by 1 if is still conscious - Increase pregnant count by 1 if it's pregnant - Update maturity status accordingly
        Parameters:
        babyCount - number of counts upon the baby turns into an adult dinosaur

      • getBehaviour

        public java.util.ArrayList<Behaviour> getBehaviour()
        Getter For the dinosaur's behaviour.
        Returns:
        An array list to store all behaviours of the dinosaur.

      • getUnconsciousCount

        public int getUnconsciousCount()
        Getter Retrieve the number of rounds the dinosaur has been unconscious. Different dinosaurs will die after different number of turns(counts) of unconsciousness.
        Returns:
        An integer: the number of rounds of unconsciousness of the dinosaur.

      • setUnconsciousCount

        public void setUnconsciousCount​(int unconsciousCount)
        Setter For number of turns the dinosaur has been unconscious.
        Parameters:
        unconsciousCount - number of rounds the dinosaur has been unconscious.

      • getPregnantCount

        public int getPregnantCount()
        Getter Retrieve the number of turns the dinosaur has been pregnant. After a specific number of turns, the dinosaur will lay an egg.
        Returns:
        An integer: the number of turns the dinosaur has been pregnant.

      • setPregnantCount

        public void setPregnantCount​(int pregnantCount)
        Setter For number of turns the dinosaur has been pregnant.
        Parameters:
        pregnantCount - number of turns the dinosaur has been pregnant.
